contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {|{{Infobox Ship Begin}} {{Infobox Ship Image |Ship image=[[File:RFA Bishopdale.jpg|300px]] |Ship caption= }} {{Infobox Ship Career |Hide header= |Ship country=UK |Ship flag=[[Image:British-Royal-Fleet-Auxiliary-Ensign.svg|60px|RFA Ensign]] |Ship name=RFA ''Bishopdale'' |Ship namesake= |Ship ordered=1936 |Ship builder=[[Lithgows]] |Ship laid down= |Ship launched=31 March 1937 |Ship acquired= |Ship completed= |Ship commissioned=6 June 1937 |Ship decommissioned=8 October 1959 |Ship in service= |Ship out of service= |Ship struck= |Ship reinstated= |Ship honours= |Ship fate=Arrived at [[Bilbao]] for scrapping on 17 February 1970 |Ship status= |Ship notes= }} {{Infobox Ship Characteristics |Hide header= |Header caption= |Ship class=[[Dale class oiler|Dale-class]] [[oil tanker|fleet tanker]] |Ship tonnage= |Ship displacement=17,357 [[ton]]s full load |Ship length={{Convert|481|ft|6|in|m|2|abbr=on}} |Ship beam={{Convert|61|ft|8|in|m|2|abbr=on}} |Ship draught={{Convert|27|ft|6|in|m|2|abbr=on}} |Ship propulsion=Burmeister & Wain 6-cylinder diesels with a single shaft. 490 nhp. |Ship speed={{Convert|11.5|kn|km/h}} |Ship range= |Ship complement=44 |Ship sensors= |Ship EW= |Ship armament= |Ship armour= |Ship aircraft= |Ship aircraft facilities= |Ship notes= }} |} '''RFA ''Bishopdale'' (A128)''' was a [[Dale class oiler|Dale-class]] [[oil tanker|fleet tanker]] of the [[Royal Fleet Auxiliary]]. She was decommissioned on 8 October 1959 and was laid up at [[HMNB Devonport|Devonport Dockyard]]. {{Lithgows ships}} {{Dale class oilers}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bishopdale}} [[Category:Dale-class oilers]] [[Category:Tankers of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary]] [[Category:1937 ships]] {{UK-aux-ship-stub}}
